name: Thunderous Smite
description: The first time you hit with a melee weapon attack during the spell's duration, your weapon rings with thunder that is audible within 300 feet and the attack deals an extra 2d6 Thunder damage. Additionally, the target must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 feet away from you and knocked Prone.
higherLevels: The extra damage increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 1.

effects.description: On a failed save, target is pushed 10 feet away and knocked Prone.
